Detailed Description

Basic spherical view model.

Provides implementations of getVisible... methods. To efficiently implement them the classes uses an Octree as internal data structure.

Assigning this class to a Robot corresponds to a "see all objects in a given radius" model.

Definition at line 25 of file spheric_view.h.

Member Function Documentation

void SphericView::init ( const WorldInformation &  world_information  )  [virtual]

Although init is trivial, it is nice to have a default constructor in virtual inherited classes. Otherwise every arbitrary deep sub class has to call the non-default constructor. Call this method before using any other method of View.

Parameters:
WorldInformation 

Reimplemented from OctreeView.
